snippet: Confirming Prime Minister Enrico Letta is an essential first step on the road to political and economic recovery, but tough challenges are ahead.
abstract: Editorial welcomes formation of new Italian government, essential first step on road to political and economic recovery; warns Prime Min Enrico Letta faces daunting challenges; contends government must be strong enough to enact structural reforms and must be deemed credible enough by European leaders to negotiate easing of austerity.
lead_paragraph: Confirming Prime Minister Enrico Letta is an essential first step on the road to political and economic recovery, but tough challenges are ahead.

headline.seo: Italy’s New Government, led by Prime Minister Letta
